post.title: linear regression with 1 variable
post.summary: Notes from a coursera course on machine learning. Machine learning problems that are classified as regression problems are taking input variables and mapping the output to a continuous expected result function. These notes provide the basic solution for a linear regression with a single variable. Otherwise known as univariate linear regression.
